org.openbel.framework.common.record
Class NamespaceRecordFile

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.common.record.RecordFile
      org.openbel.framework.common.record.NamespaceRecordFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<byte[]>
public class NamespaceRecordFile
extends RecordFile

NamespaceRecordFile defines a record file that contains namespace records.

This implementation specifically allows read and write based on the namespace record used to construct this namespace record file.

The write access to a namespace record file is only provided in append mode through the append(NamespaceEntry) api.

Author:
Anthony Bargnesi <abargnesi@selventa.com>

Nested Class Summary
static class NamespaceRecordFile.NamespaceEntry
          NamespaceRecordFile.NamespaceEntry encapsulates the data held in columns defined by the namespace record.
static class NamespaceRecordFile.NamespaceRecord
          NamespaceRecordFile.NamespaceRecord defines a record that understands how to read and write namespace data represented as bytes or the encapsulated namespace entry.

Constructor Detail

NamespaceRecordFile

public NamespaceRecordFile(File path,
                           RecordMode mode,
                           NamespaceRecordFile.NamespaceRecord nsrec)
Construct a namespace record file for read/write purposes.

Parameters:
path - the file path to this record file
mode - the record mode for this record file
nsrec - the namespace record which determines the columns in the record file, which cannot be null
Throws:
NullPointerException - Thrown if nsrec is null
Method Detail

readEntry

public NamespaceRecordFile.NamespaceEntry readEntry(long record)
                                             throws IOException
Read a specific record number from the record file as a namespace entry.

Parameters:
record - long the record number to read
Returns:
the namespace entry
Throws:
IOException - Thrown if an IO exception occurred reading from the record file

readToEntry

public void readToEntry(long record,
                        NamespaceRecordFile.NamespaceEntry e)
                 throws IOException
Read a specific record into namespace entry object e.

This reuses the entry object given in order to limit garbage collection.

Parameters:
record - long the record number to read
e - the entry to populate from the record contents
Throws:
IOException - Thrown if an IO exception occurred reading from the record file

append

public void append(NamespaceRecordFile.NamespaceEntry e)
            throws IOException
Write a namespace entry to the end of the namespace record file.

Parameters:
e - the namespace entry to append
Throws:
IOException - Thrown if an IO exception occurred appending the namespace entry to the record file.
